name: Keep it Together (Third Minima)
description:
Can you stay connected to all your emotions and keep them from falling apart as you process a challenging, emotional conversation? Take a surreal voyage and maintain your mindfulness as each emotion becomes more overwhelmed with attention.

Use your therapy pipe to repair damage to overwhelmed emotional states.

Use your third eyes to blast out clarity and removed the attention eyes.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with completely original music, art assets, effects, animations, and code.

Team

Jason McCollum

Thomas Boyster

Voice Acting by Thomas and Kate Boyster
